summary:
Dynamic, analytical and flexible governance, risk and compliance professional with over 20 years' Financial Services experience based in the U.K. and Singapore working across a wide range of areas and products. 

Full ICA Diploma in International Governance, Risk & Compliance (Merit), Financial Planning Certificate (FPC), Certificate Mortgage Advice & Practice (CeMAP), ICA Certificate Anti-Money Laundering (Distinction), Certificate Regulated Complaint Handling (CeRCH) and Certificate Regulated Customer Care (CeRCC) qualified.

Currently working in Singapore leading the Operational Risk Management team within Prudential Singapore providing 2nd Line oversight of all operation risk, incident management, third-party risk, committee governance as well as business partnering and risk culture enhancement within Prudential.

Significant knowledge in all areas of mortgage, investment, insurance, banking and savings product types, supporting digital delivery. A proven success in the management of large-scale firm-failures within FSCS (UK Deposit Protection Scheme) and by outsource partners as well as completion of mortgage complaints with Investec Investment Bank.  Strong experience working in Compliance (FCA MCOB) and Governance, Risk & Controls at Nationwide (UK) responsible for ownership of key control frameworks for all sales and service propositions for key payment and digital services. 

Relocated to Singapore in late 2018, gaining experience working within the Singaporean regulatory framework (MAS) as well as the wider APAC region; specifically the Insurance and Financial Adviser Acts and leading the Operational Risk Management team in ERM for Prudential Singapore. 

Trusted to meet delivery commitments, achieved by building and maintaining strong relationships across a range of management levels and stakeholders. 

Competent working alone or within a team, to a high standard and able to demonstrate continuous improvement within a number of target-driven environments. Support for large scale, and often forward-thinking digital projects, providing pragmatic risk, governance and compliant solutions to complex problems.

A desire to be challenged and learn new skills with an ongoing commitment to add value with a strong focus on customer and conduct outcomes.
